faq.question: How quickly can we get started with Evalucircle?
faq.answer: Most organizations are up and running within 24-48 hours. Our onboarding team will guide you through the setup process and ensure your first evaluation is launched smoothly.

faq.question: Is the platform suitable for small teams?
faq.answer: Evalucircle scales from small teams of 5 people to enterprise organizations with thousands of employees. Our pricing and features adapt to your organization's size and needs.

faq.question: How secure is our data?
faq.answer: Security is our top priority. We use enterprise-grade encryption, SOC 2 compliance, and follow strict data privacy regulations including GDPR. Your data is always protected and never shared.

faq.question: Can we customize the evaluation templates?
faq.answer: Yes! Our platform offers extensive customization options. You can create custom question sets, evaluation criteria, and reporting formats that align with your organization's specific requirements.

faq.question: What kind of support do you provide?
faq.answer: We offer comprehensive support including dedicated customer success managers, 24/7 technical support, training resources, and regular check-ins to ensure you're getting maximum value from the platform.
